name: 4 Corners (Marco98) (Marco98)
description:
4 Corners is a light and simple 2D platformer. There are only 2 mechanics: move and spike. Spiking means jutting out a big spike in 4 different directions. With this, you'll need to platform around and reach buttons, all while avoiding hazards.

This game was a test to see if I could teach the player how to get through without the use of text or a tutorial.

Playable with Xbox/PlayStation controllers only!
